name: ZUK Z2 Multilanguage ZUI ROM Project
tagline: ZUK Z2 ZUI ROM Base Resources for Translations
body:
### Welcome ZUK FANS EUROPE MULTI LANGUAGE PROJECT
Our project aims to raise awareness of ZUK and ZUI, a product made by Lenovo Mobile Groups new company, ZUK. With Chinese phones more popular than ever, consumers are importing phones and are facing the big challenge of no localisation inside the core OS. At ZUKfans.eu we aim to change this by starting our own independent multi language ROM project.

### Welcome ZUK FANS EUROPE MULTI LANGUAGE PROJECT
Currently there is a lot of editing work to do on the main repo, this will take several days to complete (written at 20th June 2016).

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributorâ€™s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
You can get involved with our Community at http://zukfans.eu/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
